#summary Imports all your decks from Magic Workstation to OCTGN2 format
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

= Usage =

Unzip the archive.
Run convertAllMwDecks2Octgn.bat '<folder>'

It will take all deck files in '<folder>' (and its subfolders) and create a file with the same name compatible with OCTGN2.


= Details =

Requires a JVM to be installed on your computer.

Contains data to import all sets up to Zendikar.
